Some engineers seem to be drawn by the work at a smaller company, which offers an opportunity to reshape culture with less corporate bureaucracy and more creative freedom. Facebook has become the cool kid on the block, and now Google Inc. wants to prove it can still be cool, too, says Danny Sullivan , who follows both companies closely as editor-in-chief of Search Engine Land. http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_19pts_vs_Nets_08/09_NBA_*Clutch_Plays Allen Iverson and Tayshaun Prince stepped up for the short-handed Detroit Pistons. Allen Iverson scored 19 points, and Tayshaun Prince added 16 to help the Pistons win their fifth straight game, 83-75 over the New Jersey Nets on Wednesday. When any team in the league loses three of their top six guys, things are going to change for them, Pistons coach Michael Beasley Curry said." Luckily, a lot of other guys stepped up." Detroit played without Rip Hamilton ( groin) and Antonio McDyess ( ribs), and lost Rasheed Wallace to a first-half foot injury,
